title: Shape of You
author: Ed Sheeran
lyrics:
[00:09.64] The club isn't the best place to find a lover
[00:12.15] So the bar is where I go (mm-mm)
[00:14.87] Me and my friends at the table doing shots
[00:17.07] Drinking fast, and then we talk slow (mm-mm)
[00:19.74] You come over and start up a conversation with just me
[00:22.27] And trust me, I'll give it a chance now (mm-mm)
[00:24.47] Take my hand, stop, put "Van the Man" on the jukebox
[00:27.28] And then we start to dance
[00:28.93] And now I'm singing like
[00:29.83] Girl, you know I want your love
[00:32.28] Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[00:35.26] Come on now, follow my lead
[00:37.32] I may be crazy, don't mind me
[00:39.67] Say, "Boy, let's not talk too much
[00:42.22] Grab on my waist and put that body on me"
[00:45.36] Come on now, follow my lead
[00:47.20] Come, come on now, follow my lead
[00:49.17] (Mm-mm)
[00:50.73] I'm in love with the shape of you
[00:53.16] We push and pull like a magnet do
[00:55.66] Although my heart is falling too
[00:58.11] I'm in love with your body
[01:00.69] Last night you were in my room
[01:03.13] And now my bed sheets smell like you
[01:05.32] Every day discovering something brand new
[01:08.07] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:10.02] Oh I, oh I, oh I, oh I
[01:13.13] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:14.85] Oh I, oh I, oh I, oh I
[01:18.03] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:19.99] Oh I, oh I, oh I, oh I
[01:23.09] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[01:25.09] Every day discovering something brand new
[01:28.36] I'm in love with the shape of you
[01:29.86] One week in we let the story begin
[01:31.93] We're going out on our first date (mm-mm)
[01:34.34] But you and me are thrifty, so go all-you-can-eat
[01:36.94] Fill up your bag, and I fill up a plate (mm-mm)
[01:39.52] We talk for hours and hours about the sweet and the sour
[01:41.97] And how your family is doing okay (mm-mm)
[01:44.58] And leave and get in a taxi, then kiss in the back seat
[01:47.10] Tell the driver make the radio play
[01:48.74] And I'm singing like
[01:50.10] Girl, you know I want your love
[01:52.27] Your love was handmade for somebody like me
[01:55.36] Come on now, follow my lead
[01:57.27] I may be crazy, don't mind me
[01:59.57] Say, "Boy, let's not talk too much
[02:02.23] Grab on my waist and put that body on me"
[02:05.30] Come on now, follow my lead
[02:07.13] Come, come on now, follow my lead
[02:09.10] (Mm-mm)
[02:10.52] I'm in love with the shape of you
[02:13.03] We push and pull like a magnet do
[02:15.64] Although my heart is falling too
[02:18.14] I'm in love with your body
[02:20.51] Last night you were in my room
[02:23.17] And now my bed sheets smell like you
[02:25.28] Every day discovering something brand new
[02:28.16] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:30.09] Oh I, oh I, oh I, oh I
[02:33.07] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:34.95] Oh I, oh I, oh I, oh I
[02:38.08] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:40.04] Oh I, oh I, oh I, oh I
[02:43.02] Oh, I'm in love with your body
[02:45.02] Every day discovering something brand new
[02:48.28] I'm in love with the shape of you
[02:50.17] Come on, be my baby, come on
[02:52.64] Come on, be my baby, come on
[02:55.06] Come on, be my baby, come on
[02:57.65] Come on, be my baby, come on
[03:00.04] Come on, be my baby, come on
[03:02.40] Come on, be my baby, come on
[03:05.06] Come on, be my baby, come on
[03:07.51] Come on, be my baby, come on
[03:10.57] I'm in love with the shape of you
[03:13.13] We push and pull like a magnet do
[03:15.68] Although my heart is falling too
[03:18.11] I'm in love with your body

[03:30.26] Come on, be my baby, come on

[03:35.21] Come on, be my baby, come on
[03:37.57] Come on, be my baby, come on (oh, I'm in love with your body)
